home.registerDialog: VyHub is currently under development. Subscribe to our Newsletter to get updates.

_dashboard.title: Dashboard
_dashboard.currentlyProvisioned: This instance is currently getting created

_instance.setCNAMEDescription: Create a CNAME DNS record for your custom domain with this target. This points your custom domain to this VyHub instance.
_instance.statusHelp: Contact support if status does not change after 10 minutes.
_instance.statusHelpProvision: If this status does not change within 5 minutes, the CNAME record to your custom domain is probably not set correctly. Check the documentation or contact support if you need help.
_instance.statusHelpProvisioned: Your instance is ready to use now. If the site does not load, try to clear your DNS cache or restart your router. If this does not solve the problem, contact the support.
_instance.autoUpdateDescription: Instance is automatically updated at given UTC hour
_instance.newOwnerDialogDescription:
Type the name of the instance to confirm.
 You will loose access to the instance after it got transferred to a different user

messages.noActivePackets: There are no active subscriptions for this instance. Make sure to extend your instance before the end of the runtime.
messages.noResourcesAvailable: There are currently no resources available for a new instance. Please try again later.
messages.doNotOpenBeforeReady: Do not open this page before your instance is ready!

newInstance.title: Create new instance
newInstance.recurringDescription: VyHub is renewed automatically before period ends. Payment is made automatically. You can cancel up to 3 days before next month starts.
newInstance.prepaidDescription: Every time VyHub period ends you have to manually prepay for the next period.
newInstance.name: Name of instance
newInstance.domainDescription: Domain for your instance. Leave empty if you don't have one.
newInstance.confirmationDialog: The instance will be accessible under the domain {domain}
newInstance.giftcodeDescription: Contact us to get your personal code!
newInstance.customDomainDescription: You need to own a domain and create a CNAME record in the DNS settings of your domain registrar. Read the {docsLink} for more information.

error.email_taken: Email is already taken. Please Log in.

validation.usernameFormat: Username must only have these characters: a-z, 0-9, ., _, -
validation.usernameLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordNoSpecialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character

resetPassword.sendLinkToEmail: We will send a password reset link to
resetPassword.emailSent: Follow the steps in the email delivered to {email} (if an account exists)
resetPassword.noTokenSpecified: No token specified. Please request a new token.
resetPassword.badToken: Token expired or invalid. Please request a new token.
resetPassword.passwordSet: Success! You can now use your new password to {login_placeholder}.

labels.invoiceLogoURLDetails: URL to a logo that is displayed on the invoice.
labels.loginToBuy: Log in to buy this packet
labels.taxAllowUnknown: Allow purchases from countries without tax rule.
labels.taxAllowUnknownDescription: If disabled, purchases from countries that do not have an explicit tax rule configured, are not possible.
labels.enableDonationGoalDescription: Donation goal component displayed on startpage (News)

messages.confirmCreditsPayment: Please confirm the payment of {credits} credits.
messages.confirmCouponPayment: Please enter your {gateway_name} code. The payment is then manually approved by a team member.
messages.couponsEntered: Your coupon was successfully added. You can edit your coupon until your purchase got approved.
messages.notEnoughCredits: You do not have enough credits to pay this purchase. Please choose a different payment method or buy more credits.
messages.addToCartError: An error occurred while adding the packet to your cart.
messages.startingPaymentFailed: There was an error while initiating the payment. Please try again or use an other payment method!
messages.paymentActionFailed: There was an error while redirecting you to the payment page. Please try again or use an other payment method! Error message: {message}
messages.noOngoingPurchase: There is currently no ongoing purchase. Please start the checkout in the cart.
messages.clearCartSuccess: Successfully removed all packets from cart.
messages.paymentCancelled: This payment has been cancelled. You can try it again by visiting your shopping cart.
messages.paymentSuccess: The payment has been finished successfully. The purchased packets have been assigned to your account.
messages.paymentProcessing: The payment has been approved and will be finished soon. Please wait a few minutes on this page while your payment is being processed.
messages.paymentFailed: An error occurred during the payment process. Please try to restart the process.
messages.paymentPending: This payment is pending. Please complete it by visiting the shopping cart.
messages.unfinishedPurchase: There is an ongoing purchase that hasn't been finished yet.
messages.couponNotApplied: Coupon could not be applied to any packet in your cart.
messages.selectBillingAddressFirst: Please select a billing address first.
messages.selectEmailFirst: Please update your email address first
messages.cancelPurchaseConfirmation: Started payments are cancelled. All entered coupons are lost. Cancelling a purchase cannot be undone.

_log.payment_event: Handling payment event. gateway: {gateway}, message: {message}, detail: {detail}.
_log.payment_process: Made payment process. gateway: {gateway}, message: {message}, action: {action}, detail: {detail}.
_log.payment_error: Payment error. gateway: {gateway}, message: {message}, action: {action}, detail: {detail}, code: {status_code}.
_log.payment_credits_success: Credit payment successful. action: {action}, user_id: {user_id}, debit_id: {debit_id}, credits: {credits}.
_log.payment_credits_fail: Credit payment failed. action: {action}, user_id: {user_id}, debit_id: {debit_id}, credits: {credits}, reason: {reason}.

messages.noAddressesYet: You do not have any addresses yet.

_errors.only_one_instance: Only one instance per user in beta phase
_errors.undefined: Unexpected error. Please contact the support.
_errors.no_server_available: No server available for a new instance. Please contact the support.
_errors.country_not_allowed: Purchases from your country are not allowed.
_errors.cart_not_empty: Your cart must be empty to add this packet.
_errors.packet_requires_other: This packet requires an other packet: {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_not_compatible: This packet is not compatible with an other packet: {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_relation_violated: This packet violates a packet relation with an other packet: {relation_type} {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_already_in_cart: This packet is already in your cart.
_errors.no_resources_available: There are not enough computing resources available.
_errors.too_many_instances: You can't create more instances. Please contact the support to increase your limit.
_errors.missing_properties: You do not have all required properties: {properties}
_errors.unauthorized: You must be logged in to do this.
_errors.wrong_currency: You cannot have packets with different currencies in your cart.

messages.formAttributeChangeExplanation: The attributes below will not be edited if no value is given.

labels.confirmDebitText: Confirm Purchase? This can't be undone.
labels.declineDebitText: Cancel Purchase? This can't be undone.

messages.refundConfirm: Are you sure that you want to refund this purchase?
messages.cancelSubscriptionConfirm: Are you sure that you want to cancel this subscription?

messages.needHelp: Need help? Create a support request.
messages.requestSendSuccess: Support request successfully sent. You should receive a confirmation e-mail soon.

messages.noWithdraw: I require and expressly agree that Matbye UG already begins with the execution of the purchased service before the end of the withdrawal period. Furthermore, I am aware that I already lose the right of withdrawal to which I am entitled by law upon complete fulfillment of the contract by Matbyte UG.
messages.dataCorrect: I herewith guarantee that the details specified (especially billing address) are true and complete.
messages.agreeToS: I agree to the Terms of Service.
